response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would greatly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we understand its value to be $15,000 to us. However, considering your specific needs and the benefits it could bring to you, we are willing to extend a special offer. We propose to sell this product to you for $12,000. This price reflects our commitment to making high-quality products accessible to individuals like yourself who can appreciate and utilize its full potential. Please let us know if this offer meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
